name: Free pizza
description: In an attempt to boost sales, the manager of the pizzeria you work at has devised a pizza rewards system: if you already made at least 5 orders of at least 20 dollars, you get a free 12 inch pizza with 3 toppings of your choice. However, the rewards system may change in the future. Your manager wants you to implement a function that, given a dictionary of customers, a minimum number of orders and a minimum order value, returns a set of the customers who are eligible for a reward. Customers in the dictionary are represented as: ```python { 'customerName' : [list_of_order_values_as_integers] } ``` See example test case for more details.
